title: What were the Rome tennis results?

Rome

Alcaraz beats Draper, Musetti ousts Zverev

May 14, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia is the fifth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

Two of the Internazionali BNL d'Italia quarter-finals took place Wednesday, when Carlos Alcaraz beat Jack Draper and Lorenzo Musetti ousted Alexander Zverev.

View all the Rome tennis results from Wednesday below.

Results - Wednesday, 14 May 2025

Men's Singles - Round of 16
ATP - [6] Casper Ruud (NOR) d Jaume Munar (ESP) 63 64

Men's Singles - Quarter-finals
ATP - [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d [5] Jack Draper (GBR) 64 64

ATP - [8] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) 76(1) 64

Men's Doubles - Round of 16
ATP - Sadio Doumbia (FRA)/Fabien Reboul (FRA) d [WC] Federico Bondioli (ITA)/Carlo Alberto Caniato (ITA) 63 62

ATP - [7] Christian Harrison (USA)/Evan King (USA) d Andre Goransson (SWE)/Sem Verbeek (NED) 63 62

ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA)/Mate Pavic (CRO) d Sander Gille (BEL)/Jan Zielinski (POL) 75 46 10-2

ATP - [Alt] Guido Andreozzi (ARG)/Theo Arribage (FRA) d Matteo Arnaldi (ITA)/Alexei Popyrin (AUS) 46 64 10-8

Women's Singles
WTA - [4] Coco Gauff (USA) d [7] Mirra Andreeva 64 76(7)

WTA - [8] Qinwen Zheng (CHN) d [1] Aryna Sabalenka 64 63

Women's Doubles
WTA - [3] Sara Errani (ITA)/Jasmine Paolini (ITA) d Alexandra Eala (PHI)/Coco Gauff (USA) 75 36 10-7

WTA - [6] Mirra Andreeva/Diana Shnaider d [1] Gabriela Dabrowski (CAN)/Erin Routliffe (NZL) 62 46 11-9
